skills.skill: Bachelor's Degree in Accounting or related field

duties_responsibilities.duty: Build year-round client relationships and provide tax preparation, tax audit support, and tax planning year-round.
Create confidence in clients by conducting tax interviews face to face and through virtual tools such as video conferencing, phone, chat, and email.
Generate business growth, increase client retention, and offer additional products and services.
Grow tax expertise and support tax planning and audit activities.
Complete the H&R Block Tax Knowledge Assessment² or equivalent, and must complete 18-hour continuing education requirement and meet all other IRS and applicable state requirements.
Possess CPA or Enrolled Agent certification, and experience conducting business tax returns and virtual tax interviews is a plus.
Collaborate with teams, maintain an exceptional work environment, and support diversity and inclusion initiatives at H&R Block.
